paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the haproxy data.  It will default to the hostname of the server

paramSchema.title: Socket path
paramSchema.name: socketPath
paramSchema.description: The Haproxy statistics Socket path.  Socket or URL is required

paramSchema.title: Statistics URL
paramSchema.name: url
paramSchema.description: The URL endpoint of where the haproxy statistics are hosted.  Socket or URL is required

paramSchema.title: Username
paramSchema.name: username
paramSchema.description: If the endpoint is password protected, what username should graphdat use when calling it.

paramSchema.title: Password
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: If the endpoint is password protected, what password should graphdat use when calling it.

paramSchema.title: Filter
paramSchema.name: proxies
paramSchema.description: Which Server groups would you like to view

paramSchema.title: Poll Seconds
paramSchema.name: pollSeconds
paramSchema.description: How often should the plugin poll the Haproxy endpoint
